Message.Title: The blessings of marriage in these United States
Message.Msg: Based upon the recent SCOTUS rulings and IMHO it is time for all of us to welcome our LGBT brothers and sisters to the wonders and blessings of marriage in these United States: o After the honeymoon is over you will find that your partner has a problem with your ability to listen to him or her o After the honeymoon is over you will find that your partner has a problem with your work habits (e.g., you work too much, you don't work enough, you need to get a second job, you care more about the people at the office than you care about me, etc.) o After the honeymoon is over you will find that someone else will be controlling your finances o After the honeymoon is over you will find that your earnings will never be enough o After the honeymoon is over your partner's clothes will never fit as well as they did on the day before the honeymoon o After the honeymoon is over you should be prepared to hand over half of what you have, if you live in a community property state o After the honeymoon is over you should be prepared to pay alimony to your ex-partner, if you live in one of the states that allow for it o After the honeymoon is over you and your partner will get to enjoy the benefits of federal and state tax penalties for married couples I could go on, but I'm sure you get the point, marriage in these United State is truly a wonderful and blessed institution that should be enjoyed by all. "In your heart you know he is right." The Frogg

Topic.Title: The blessings of marriage in these United States

Message.Msg: "In your heart you know he is right." Come on Froggie, I ain't all that bad. Although I will add our honeymoon was over the first time she caught more and bigger bass than me.

Topic.Title: The blessings of marriage in these United States

Message.Msg: You're so old-fashioned.

Topic.Title: The blessings of marriage in these United States

Message.Msg: Old fashion was far superior to the new fashion. Honesty was once the best policy. Now it will get you fired and put in jail. In the old system there were few laws but they were followed and enforced. Now there are so many laws that the only way you can do anything is to break a law but it is OK because illegal is accepted as OK.
Considering the source, that can be viewed as a compliment. Thank you.

Topic.Title: The blessings of marriage in these United States

Message.Msg: I agree, but I'll bet she at least had the courtesy to have your beer iced and ready before you left for the lake, and not only baited her hook, but baited your hook while she tuned in Rush on your transistor radio for you. Yes, I guess ricky is right, I am old-fashioned, and I guess those days are gone for ever. At least my dog (Old Blue) still loves me. If he could only learn to tune in Rush on my transistor, then I think I would marry him. "In your heart you know he is right." The Frogg

Message.Title: Beginning it's daily drop a little early today

Topic.Title: The blessings of marriage in these United States

Message.Msg: "Honesty was once the best policy." It will get you fired from conservative media, that's for sure.

Topic.Title: The blessings of marriage in these United States

Message.Msg: "I'll bet she at least had the courtesy to have your beer iced and ready before you left for the lake, and not only baited her hook, but baited your hook while she tuned in Rush on your transistor radio for you." Do you want a wife or a servant, froggie? With an attitude like that, you better start training your dog. I just don't see Ann Coulter or Michelle Malkin icing your beer and baiting your hook for you. What kind of a man has a woman bait his hook for him anyway?

Topic.Title: All signs point to a huge run in DOMK

Topic.Title: The blessings of marriage in these United States

Message.Msg: Oh ricky, what a sad little caricature of yourself you have become. Maybe it is time for you to go back to your mother's basement, where I am sure she has some milk and cookies ready for you, and stop trying to match your childish ramblings with the adults. "In your heart you know he is right." The Frogg

Topic.Title: The blessings of marriage in these United States

Message.Msg: I don't think a "milk and cookies" insult is the way to go when your pining for a relationship based on Milk-Bones. But one thing is clear from the problems you list and characteristics you value from marriage: your conception of marriage is completely foreign to me, and long before we even get to sexual orientation.

Topic.Title: The blessings of marriage in these United States

Message.Msg: No sir, I ice my beer. I'm a bit particular about how it's done.

Message.Title: It's a shame that T

Message.Title: Very weak finish AGAIN!
Message.Msg: Gave back half it's gains. Not good folks! There is no reason for people to hold this and it's being sold into every little run. Very bad sign for any stock. The long term readjustment down of this stock price continues. Osso
